author: epunzalan
msg: - implemented check for usage.html and faq.html links inside site.xml
- removed plugin specific documentation rules from the abstract class

author: cam
msg: 1. Type and animation information for XML attributes of each SVG element
is now exposed via the ExtendedTraitAccess interface.  (This maybe
should change from overridden methods to a single method that looks
up a hash table per element--this would take more memory, but be
2. Added animation support to the SVGAnimatedNumber, SVGAnimatedString,
SVGAnimatedInteger implementations.  They now derive from an
3. Renamed some constants in XMLConstants to be more consistent wrt node
4. The following XML attributes are now animatable:
rect		x, y, width, height, rx, ry
5. Most (all?) CSS properties should now be animatable.
7. Added an iterator to DoublyIndexedTable, since I find I often need to
8. Added animation engine values classes for angles,
preserveAspectRatio values, rects, strings, transform lists,
9. Fixed infinite loop with mutually dependent timing specifier lists
10. Animation attributes now implemented: accumulate, values, by,
11. SVGContexts are now associated with SVG elements even if the
document is not interactive or dynamic.  This allows the bridges
to use the the SVG DOM animated values on the first build, without
which some code duplication would be required.
12. Updated org.w3c.dom.svg interfaces from SVG 1.0 to SVG 1.1.
